ing: 1 (5 ounce) can tuna in water, drained
n: Amazingly Good and Healthy Tuna Salad
des: "This recipe is tweaked from one I found. It is so good, my husband, who is a very picky eater, often requests this! Enjoy and pat yourself on the back for eating a healthy meal."
ins:
Mix tuna, cranberries, apple, mayonnaise, green onion, sea salt, and black pepper together in a bowl; refrigerate 1 hour.
Put 2 cups spinach on each of 2 plates. Top spinach with about half the tuna salad.
